name: Lunar Unit SK-8
description:
Lunar Unit SK-8 (Git Hub Game Off 2020) I had wanted to make a simple game where movement and attacks were limited to sliding like in the Pokemon Ice Path puzzles. So I fit that to the theme - the player must use a moonshot approach (skating) to destroy the evil on the moon.

Instructions:

  • Move to attack
  • Space to advance dialogue
  • Enemies can hurt you if you are standing still
  • Boss attacks can hurt you any time
  • Defeat all enemies in a room to proceed (Go near door to open it)
  • The final room has a 1:3 chance to give you an HP bonus
